text: Risenga Ishall will be an indoor ice hockey arena, located in Asker, Norway. The 3,650-spectator arena will serve as the home of GET-ligaen side Frisk Asker Ishockey. Construction on the new arena started in September 3, 2019, and completion is planned for December 2021. ==References== Category:Frisk Asker Ishockey Category:Indoor ice hockey venues in Norway Category:Sports venues in Viken Category:Indoor arenas under construction
title: Risenga Ishall
